body_html: BTW, an unrelated question, what is TFs and Google's policy on rebasing the commits -- do I have to rebase to the current origin/HEAD before submitting a PR? Also, do I need to squash intermediate (minor) commits? Sorry, I am new to TF contributions, and don't know where to find these answers
